cpit380practice

Class SlowTurtle

  • java.lang.Object
    • cpit380practice.SimpleTurtle
      • cpit380practice.Turtle
        • cpit380practice.SlowTurtle

  • public class SlowTurtle
extends Turtle
    Class slow turtle that doesn't move as quickly as a normal turtle. If asked to go forward it will only go 50 and if asked to go forward an amount it only goes forward 1/2 that amount

      void forward(int amount)
      Method to go forward by a passed amount it will actually go forward by half that amount
